plot: For two years, Garcia Roure followed six patients at a hospital in Barcelona as they struggled with serious psychoses - like Javier who has had sound hallucinations and delirium for 20 years about all kinds of cosmic issues. This beautifully shot study shows how society copes with this kind of mental patients.   Written by  Int'l Rotterdam Film Festival
title: Una cierta verdad
